author: maxb
msg: Fix erroneous references to 'next-id' in the BDB code. The special key name is
(svn_fs_bdb__get_txn_list): Fix comment and local variable name.

author: vgeorgescu
msg: When running DAV tests on Windows, don't try to load mod_authn_core for
Apache 2.2, as that module only exists in 2.3.
(Httpd.__init__): Only load mod_authn_core.so for Apache versions 2.3+.

author: cmpilato
msg: My thoughts are many and conflicting.  Remove the 'trail-free-bdb' branch.

author: cmpilato
msg: Instead of storing a flag in the filesystem private data structure
that says whether or not we're in a BDB-transaction-protected state or
not, just store the transaction pointer itself.  Trails are now
basically just a convenience structure for carrying a filesystem
(begin_trail, abort_trail, commit_trail): Check and set the FS's new
'db_txn' member instead of the now-missing 'in_txn_trail' flag.
Use FS_DB_TXN() macro instead of looking for a 'db_txn' in the trail.

author: cmpilato
msg: Create new 'trail-free-bdb' branch for playing around with a libsvn_fs_base
that doesn't have the word 'trail' scattered all over the place.
